name: Urivi Vikram Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Urivi Vikram Charitable Trust (UVCT), a non-governmental and non profit Organization, was established in India in 1991. It was founded by Dr U N B Rao and his wife, Urivi Chaya , with the support of 60 other professionals and well meaning citizens, in fond memory of their only son Urivi Vikram who was killed, at a prime age of 20/21 years, in a road accident. Rao family tried to reverse the arrow of sorrow and work to help empower the adolescents and young adults.
